sect1.title: Creating Essential Symlinks
sect1.para: Some programs use hard-wired paths to programs which do not exist yet. In order to satisfy these programs, create a number of symbolic links which will be replaced by real files throughout the course of the next chapter after the software has been installed.

screen.userinput: ln -sv /tools/bin/{bash,cat,grep,pwd,rm,stty} ${CLFS}/bin ln -sv /tools/bin/file ${CLFS}/usr/bin ln -sv /tools/lib/libgcc_s.so{,.1} ${CLFS}/usr/lib ln -sv /tools/lib/libstd*so* ${CLFS}/usr/lib ln -sv bash ${CLFS}/bin/sh
